meanings.definition: Books, pamphlets, or broadsides printed before 1501.
meanings.sent1: The library had a rare collection of incunables.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study incunables to understand early printing techniques.
meanings.sent3: The incunables in the museum were so old, they seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her love for incunables was like a treasure hunt through history.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the incunables was like stepping back in time.

meanings.definition: A collection of early printed works.
meanings.sent1: The incunables displayed in the exhibit were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a valuable incunables collection from her grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The incunables on the shelf looked like a colorful history lesson.
meanings.sent4: His passion for incunables was a window to the past.
meanings.sent5: The incunables in the library were a glimpse into ancient knowledge.
